WRITING.TEXT: And in Agents of SHIELD.
What did you think of Justified? That show was set in Kentucky, and I freaking loved it.

It did disappoint financially in the U.S. when it was first released in 2014 (it grossed $100.1 million domestically, but it had a $178 million budget). But it did well enough overseas to justify its domestic underperformance (grossing $364.3 million worldwide and sold over a million DVDs), and audiences and critics loved it, so now a sequel is in development apparently.
Yep, I wouldn't be surprised to see another Resident Evil film announced in the near future as a result of its huge overseas business.

Terrific number for Get Out. I'm so happy that both critics and audiences are absolutely loving it. Jordan Peele is now going to have so much clout in Hollywood - good for him. I hope it has good legs in the weeks ahead.
